forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain, heavy at times early. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 18C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 64F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and thunderstorms. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
